settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
  /* --- Global resets at the very top --- */
  html,body{margin:0!important}
  .shopify-section:first-child{margin-top:0!important}

  :root{--annbar-h:0px;--hdr-h:0px}

  /* Fixed announcement bar (class added by script) */
  .ann-fixed{
    position:fixed!important;top:0;left:0;right:0;width:100%;
    z-index:2147483647;background:inherit
  }

  /* Offset ONLY the main content. Header remains in flow (sticky). */
  html.ann-ready #MainContent{margin-top:var(--annbar-h)!important}

  /* FABRIC header stabilization — prevent “stretch/grow” and double offsets */
  .site-header,.header,.header-wrapper,.shopify-section-header{
    position: sticky !important;
    top: var(--annbar-h) !important;          /* sit directly under announcement bar */
    z-index: 2147483646 !important;
    background: #000 !important;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
    padding-top: 0 !important;
    transform: none !important;               /* kill stacking-context side effects */
    height: auto !important;
    min-height: unset !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
  }

  /* Fabric/Dawn-style spacer placeholders that cause stretching */
  .header--spacer,
  .header-placeholder,
  [data-header-spacer],
  [data-header-sticky-spacer]{display:none!important;height:0!important}

  /* Keep the very top solid, avoid white flash during rubber-band overscroll */
  html,body{background:#000!important}
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const html = document.documentElement;

  // Robust finders for announcement bar and header across Fabric/OS2.0
  const findBar = () => document.querySelector([
    '#shopify-section-announcement-bar',
    '.shopify-section-announcement-bar',
    '.announcement-bar','.announcement','.notification-bar','.top-bar',
    '[id*="announcement"]','[class*="announcement"]'
  ].join(','));

  const findHeader = () => document.querySelector([
    '.header-wrapper',
    '.shopify-section-header',
    '.site-header',
    '[id*="header"]'
  ].join(','));

  function activate(bar){
    if(!bar) return;
    bar.classList.add('ann-fixed');
    html.classList.add('ann-ready');

    const header = findHeader();
    const main = document.getElementById('MainContent') || document.querySelector('main');

    const setVars = () => {
      const annH = bar.offsetHeight || 0;
      html.style.setProperty('--annbar-h', annH + 'px');

      // Ensure header sits right under the bar without growing
      if (header) {
        // Force sticky behavior (Fabric sometimes toggles)
        const cs = getComputedStyle(header);
        if (cs.position !== 'sticky') header.style.position = 'sticky';
        header.style.top = 'var(--annbar-h)';

        // Remove any theme-injected top padding that can “stretch”
        header.style.paddingTop = '0';
        header.style.marginTop  = '0';
        header.style.height     = 'auto';
        header.style.minHeight  = '';
      }

      // Content offset: only the announcement bar (header stays in flow when sticky)
      if (main) main.style.marginTop = 'var(--annbar-h)';
    };

    setVars();
    new ResizeObserver(setVars).observe(bar);
    window.addEventListener('load', setVars);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setVars);
  }

  // Run now, on ready, and if sections render late
  let bar = findBar();
  if (bar) { activate(bar); return; }

  const ready = () => { bar = findBar(); if (bar) { activate(bar); obs.disconnect(); } };
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', ready); else ready();

  const obs = new MutationObserver(ready);
  obs.observe(document.documentElement, {childList:true,subtree:true});
})();
</script>
